alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:48AM CST until January 26 at 3:26PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 330 PM CST.
